name: Swing a Lightsaber

banner.text: Not as clumsy or random as a blaster, a Lightsaber requires skill and a connection to The Force. Good luck.

steps.grabBlockCopy: Drag the Force Kit: pointer x block into the code space.
steps.connectCopy: Connect it to the Lightsaber x position.

steps.text: Move your hand left and right to move the Lightsaber. Ready to make it tilt as you swing it?

steps.openFlyoutCopy: Set the angle of the Lightsaber so it tilts when it's moved. Open the ${toolbox#math} tray.
steps.grabBlockCopy: Drag the lerp block into the code space.

steps.bannerCopy: The lerp block will help make the motion of the Lightsaber smoother. Change 0 to -20 so Rey's Lightsaber tilts left when it moves left.
Change <kc-string-preview>200</kc-string-preview> to <kc-string-preview>20</kc-string-preview> so it tilts right when it moves right.

steps.grabBlockCopy: Drag this block into the code space.
Drag this block into the code space.

steps.bannerCopy: Change <kc-string-preview>+</kc-string-preview> to <kc-string-preview>÷ divide</kc-string-preview> from the dropdown list.

steps.text: Move your hand, see how it feels.

banner.text: Watch where you’re swinging that thing.
